description: Updates the configuration metadata of a session for a given Q App sessionId.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Q App session to update configuration for.

parameters.name: sharingConfiguration
parameters.description: The new sharing configuration for the Q App data collection session. Indicates whether an Q App session is shareable with other users. acceptResponses (boolean) --- Indicates whether an Q App session can accept responses from users. revealCards (boolean) --- Indicates whether collected responses for an Q App session are revealed for all users.

nested_params.name: enabled
nested_params.description: Indicates whether an Q App session is shareable with other users.

nested_params.name: acceptResponses
nested_params.description: Indicates whether an Q App session can accept responses from users.

nested_params.name: revealCards
nested_params.description: Indicates whether collected responses for an Q App session are revealed for all users.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the updated Q App session.

nested_items.name: sessionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the updated Q App session.

nested_items.name: sessionName
nested_items.description: The new name of the updated Q App session.

nested_items.name: sharingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The new sharing configuration of the updated Q App data collection session.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether an Q App session is shareable with other users.

nested_items.name: acceptResponses
nested_items.description: Indicates whether an Q App session can accept responses from users.

nested_items.name: revealCards
nested_items.description: Indicates whether collected responses for an Q App session are revealed for all users.
